original_text:
For he has not despised or scorned
    the suffering of the afflicted one;
he has not hidden his face from him
    but has listened to his cry for help.
korean_text: 그는 곤고한 자의 곤고를 멸시하거나 싫어하지 아니하시며 그의 얼굴을 그에게서 숨기지 아니하시고 그가 울부짖을 때에 들으셨도다

sentences.original_text: or scorned the suffering of the afflicted one
he has not hidden his face from him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그에게 자기 얼굴을 숨기지 않았다

sentences.original_text: but has listened to his cry for help
